title: Iterative Learning Control Design for Collaborative Tracking Control

context.prior_knowledge: Foundations in control theory, linear system modeling, and optimization techniques
context.additional_context: Mobile-based education centered on practical applications of distributed control systems and constraint handling case studies

learning_goals: Learners can explain the fundamental principles of collaborative tracking control systems and their implementation with ILC
Learners can design iterative learning algorithms for constrained distributed control systems
Learners can verify the implementation procedures of distributed controllers using ADMM through simulations
Learners can use quantitative metrics to evaluate tracking error reduction performance
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
